segments.text: Watching the little girl, I see how much she trusts her brother to get her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing there with her hand out, just waiting for him to give her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of warmth seeing how much faith she has in him, even if he's being a bit reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the danger he's in, or maybe she just doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would try to climb up there herself if he wasn't doing it for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how attentive she is, her eyes fixed on the cookie jar like it's the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their bond, how they work together to get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, standing there with her hand out, completely trusting her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't let her down, literally or figuratively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at her enthusiasm, even if it's a bit misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR
